message.body: So after I ran into you today I forgot to ask you, you be buying for Push for BOTB?
Of course! I don't know any of the other bands lol. Did you end up coming to Grease btw?
I wanted to so so so badly, but I ended up having the flu for like 4 days, all of them being on the days of the shows lol
Aww that sucks. But it's ok
I saw a bunch of pictures from the show, especially you mooning =p
Lolol yeah, there's videos too somewhere. You can watch it and then it will practically be like you went for free!
I'll see it lol, but there's nothing like live music/shows/ and just performances in general.
